body:
Hi Ian --

Thanks for the quick reply -- that clears up the mystery.

A thought: I had never heard of "canonical methods" before, and spent a
fair amount of time trying to figure out why on earth my method signature
was wrong. Perhaps adding a bit of explanation to the message issued by
"vet" could save others an hour or so of wild-goose-chase time...

Bob

On Tue, Jun 7, 2016 at 9:58 AM, Ian Lance Taylor <notifications@github.com>
